actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the definition of a qualified general assistance program for purposes of the targeted jobs credit.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to qualify welfare recipients who receive payments by voucher for the targeted jobs income tax credit.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the definition of a qualified general assistance program for purposes of the targeted jobs credit.
